description.value:
Special: Toxic, Unbalanced

Note: Extremely Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Failing Toughness Test from Toxic Quality causes 2d10+5 R Damage (ignores Armour/Toughness) instead of 1d10 I as normal. Can't use other toxins. Weapon loses Toxic Quality afterwards, wielder makes Half Action and +10 Chem-Use/Tech-Use test to regain it.
